channel.title: awards on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in awards on Konigi

item.title: The Shorty Awards
item.description: An award to celebrate short form public messaging, and honor the world's top Twitterers. http://shortyawards.com/

item.title: Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum: People's Design Award
item.description: Results are in of the People's Choice award for the Cooper-Hewitt's National Design Award. The Zon Hearing Aid grabbed the prize. http://peoplesdesignaward.cooperhewitt.org/2008/browse/all/0

item.title: Penguin Design Award
item.description: Penguin Books has announced the winners and shortlist for the 2008 Penguin Design Award. http://www.penguin.co.uk/static/cs/uk/0/minisites/penguindesignaward/2008winners.php
